page.title: 17RELIGION-OFFORD
page.content: There are three churches in the Offords in 1985.One is a Baptist Church,a small red brick building on the main street.The other two are Church of England buildings -the Church of St.Peter in Offord D'Arcy is no longer used but is maintained and cared for even though it is redunant.It is a beautiful stone and flint building with a spire,set in attractive grounds,such a pity that it should be empty and locked.The other church which is used regularly for worship is All Saints Church in Offord D'Arcy.This church has a tower and is situated beside the village hall.It's vicar,The Reverend Dr.Pryke has recently retired and so there is no permanent vicar in this parish at present.
